body:
# DeepL.cr [![CI](https://github.com/kojix2/deepl.cr/actions/workflows/ci.yml/badge.svg)](https://github.com/kojix2/deepl.cr/actions/workflows/ci.yml) [![Docs Latest](https://img.shields.io/badge/docs-latest-blue.svg)](https://kojix2.github.io/deepl.cr/) Crystal library for the [DeepL language translation API](https://www.deepl.com/pro-api/). ## Installation 1. Add the dependency to your `shard.yml`: ```yaml dependencies: deepl: github: kojix2/deepl ``` 2. Run `shards install` ## Usage ```crystal require "deepl" # Translate text t = DeepL::Translator.new(auth_key: "YOUR_AUTH_KEY") puts t.translate_text("こんにちは、世界！", target_lang: "EN") # => "Hello, world!" # Translate document t = DeepL::Translator.new(auth_key: "YOUR_AUTH_KEY") puts t.translate_document("path/to/document.pdf", target_lang: "EN") # Save to file (default: "path/to/document_EN.pdf") ``` See [documentation](https://kojix2.github.io/deepl.cr/). ### Environment Variables
Name Description
DEEPL_AUTH_KEY DeepL API authentication key
DEEPL_TARGET_LANG Default target language
DEEPL_USER_AGENT User-Agent
## Development - Pull requests are welcome. - If you want to take over the project and become the owner, please submit your request with a pull request. ## Use case - [DeepL CLI](https://github.com/kojix2/deepl-cli) ## Contributing 1. Fork it () 2. Create your feature branch (`git checkout -b my-new-feature`) 3. Commit your changes (`git commit -am 'Add some feature'`) 4. Push to the branch (`git push origin my-new-feature`) 5. Create a new Pull Request # License MIT

def.name: summary
def.body:
String.build do |s|
  s << "(i) #{id}"
  s << " (s) #{status}"
  if seconds_remaining
    s << " (r) #{seconds_remaining}"
  end
  if billed_characters
    s << " (c) #{billed_characters}"
  end
  if error_message
    s << " (e) #{error_message}"
  end
end

constructors.name: new
constructors.args_string: (glossary_id : String, name : String, ready : Bool, source_lang : String, target_lang : String, creation_time : String, entry_count : UInt32)
constructors.args_html: (glossary_id : String, name : String, ready : Bool, source_lang : String, target_lang : String, creation_time : String, entry_count : UInt32)

def.name: new
def.body:
_ = allocate
_.initialize(glossary_id, name, ready, source_lang, target_lang, creation_time, entry_count)
if _.responds_to?(:finalize)
  ::GC.add_finalizer(_)
end
_

constructors.name: new
constructors.args_string: (auth_key : Nil | String = nil, user_agent : Nil | String = nil, server_url : Nil | String = nil)
constructors.args_html: (auth_key : Nil | String = nil, user_agent : Nil | String = nil, server_url : Nil | String = nil)

def.name: create_glossary
def.body:
url = "#{server_url}/glossaries"
data = {"name" => name, "source_lang" => source_lang, "target_lang" => target_lang, "entries" => entries, "entries_format" => entry_format}
response = Crest.post(url, form: data, headers: http_headers_json)
handle_response(response, glossary: true)
GlossaryInfo.from_json(response.body)

def.name: delete_glossary
def.body:
url = "#{server_url}/glossaries/#{glossary_id}"
response = Crest.delete(url, headers: http_headers_base)
handle_response(response, glossary: true)

def.name: get_glossary_entries
def.body:
header = http_headers_base
header["Accept"] = "text/tab-separated-values"
url = "#{server_url}/glossaries/#{glossary_id}/entries"
response = Crest.get(url, headers: header)
handle_response(response, glossary: true)
response.body

def.name: get_glossary_info
def.body:
url = "#{server_url}/glossaries/#{glossary_id}"
response = Crest.get(url, headers: http_headers_base)
handle_response(response, glossary: true)
GlossaryInfo.from_json(response.body)

def.name: get_glossary_info_by_name
def.body:
glossaries = list_glossaries
glossary_info_list = glossaries.select do |g|
  g.name == name
end
case glossary_info_list.size
when 0
  raise(GlossaryNameNotFoundError.new(name))
when 2..
  ids = glossary_info_list.map do |glossary_info|
    glossary_info.glossary_id
  end
  raise(GlossaryNameMultipleMatchError.new(name, ids))
when 1
  return glossary_info
else
  raise
end

def.name: get_glossary_language_pairs
def.body:
url = "#{server_url}/glossary-language-pairs"
response = Crest.get(url, headers: http_headers_base)
handle_response(response, glossary: true)
Array(GlossaryLanguagePair).from_json((JSON.parse(response.body))["supported_languages"].to_json)

def.name: guess_target_language
def.body:
tl = ENV["DEEPL_TARGET_LANG"]?
if tl
  return tl
end
{% if (flag?(:darwin)) || (flag?(:unix)) %}
        ENV["LANG"]?.try &.split("_").try &.first.upcase || "EN"
      {% else %}{% if flag?(:windows) %}
        l = `powershell -Command "[System.Globalization.CultureInfo]::CurrentCulture.TwoLetterISOLanguageName"`
        l.empty? ? "EN" : l.strip.upcase
      {% else %}
        # From official deepl documentation, EN is deprecated.
        # EN-US or EN-GB is recommended.
        "EN"
      {% end %}{% end %}

def.name: list_glossaries
def.body:
url = "#{server_url}/glossaries"
response = Crest.get(url, headers: http_headers_base)
handle_response(response, glossary: true)
glossaries_json = (JSON.parse(response.body))["glossaries"].to_json
Array(GlossaryInfo).from_json(glossaries_json)

instance_methods.name: translate_document
instance_methods.args_string: (path, target_lang, source_lang = nil, formality = nil, glossary_id = nil, glossary_name = nil, output_format = nil, output_file = nil, interval = 5.0, &block : String -> )
instance_methods.args_html: (path, target_lang, source_lang = nil, formality = nil, glossary_id = nil, glossary_name = nil, output_format = nil, output_file = nil, interval = 5.0, &block : String -> )

def.name: translate_document
def.body: translate_document(path: path, target_lang: target_lang, source_lang: source_lang, formality: formality, glossary_id: glossary_id, glossary_name: glossary_name, output_format: output_format, output_file: output_file, interval: interval, block: block)

instance_methods.name: translate_document
instance_methods.args_string: (path, target_lang, source_lang = nil, formality = nil, glossary_id = nil, glossary_name = nil, output_format = nil, output_file = nil, interval = 5.0, block : String ->  | Nil = nil)
instance_methods.args_html: (path, target_lang, source_lang = nil, formality = nil, glossary_id = nil, glossary_name = nil, output_format = nil, output_file = nil, interval = 5.0, block : String -> | Nil = nil)

def.name: translate_document
def.body:
source_path = Path[path]
document_handle = translate_document_upload(path: source_path, target_lang: target_lang, source_lang: source_lang, formality: formality, glossary_id: glossary_id, glossary_name: glossary_name, output_format: output_format)
block.try(&.call("[deepl.cr] (i) id (k) key (s) status (r) seconds_remaining (c) billed_characters (e) error_message"))
block.try(&.call("[deepl.cr] Uploaded #{source_path} (i) #{document_handle.id} (k) #{document_handle.key}"))
translate_document_wait_until_done(document_handle, interval) do |document_status|
  block.try(&.call("[deepl.cr] #{document_status.summary}"))
end
output_file || (output_file = generate_output_file(source_path, target_lang, output_format))
translate_document_download(output_file, document_handle)
block.try(&.call("[deepl.cr] Saved #{output_file}"))

def.name: translate_document_download
def.body:
data = {"document_key" => handle.key}
url = "#{api_url_document}/#{handle.id}/result"
Crest.post(url, form: data, headers: http_headers_json) do |response|
  if response.success?
  else
    raise(DocumentTranslationError.new)
  end
  File.open(output_file, "wb") do |file|
    IO.copy(response.body_io, file)
  end
end

def.name: translate_document_get_status
def.body:
url = "#{api_url_document}/#{handle.id}"
data = {"document_key" => handle.key}
response = Crest.post(url, form: data, headers: http_headers_json)
handle_response(response)
DocumentStatus.from_json(response.body)

instance_methods.name: translate_document_upload
instance_methods.args_string: (path : Path | String, target_lang, source_lang = nil, formality = nil, glossary_id = nil, glossary_name = nil, output_format = nil) : DocumentHandle
instance_methods.args_html: (path : Path | String, target_lang, source_lang = nil, formality = nil, glossary_id = nil, glossary_name = nil, output_format = nil) : DocumentHandle

def.name: translate_document_upload
def.body:
if path.is_a?(String)
  path = Path[path]
end
if glossary_name
  glossary_id || (glossary_id = (get_glossary_info_by_name(glossary_name)).glossary_id)
end
params = {"source_lang" => source_lang, "formality" => formality, "target_lang" => target_lang, "glossary_id" => glossary_id, "output_format" => output_format}.compact!
file = File.open(path)
params = params.merge({"file" => file})
response = Crest.post(api_url_document, form: params, headers: http_headers_base)
handle_response(response)
DocumentHandle.from_json(response.body)

instance_methods.name: translate_document_wait_until_done
instance_methods.args_string: (handle : DocumentHandle, interval = 5.0, block : DocumentStatus ->  | Nil = nil)

def.name: translate_document_wait_until_done
def.body:
loop do
  sleep(interval)
  document_status = translate_document_get_status(handle)
  block.try(&.call(document_status))
  case document_status.status
  when "done"
    break
  when "error"
    raise(DocumentTranslationError.new(document_status.error_message))
  end
end

instance_methods.name: translate_text
instance_methods.args_string: (text : String | Array(String), target_lang, source_lang = nil, context = nil, split_sentences = nil, preserve_formatting : Bool | Nil = nil, formality = nil, glossary_id = nil, glossary_name = nil, tag_handling = nil, outline_detection : Bool | Nil = nil, non_splitting_tags : Array(String) | Nil = nil, splitting_tags : Array(String) | Nil = nil, ignore_tags : Array(String) | Nil = nil) : Array(TextResult)
instance_methods.args_html: (text : String | Array(String), target_lang, source_lang = nil, context = nil, split_sentences = nil, preserve_formatting : Bool | Nil = nil, formality = nil, glossary_id = nil, glossary_name = nil, tag_handling = nil, outline_detection : Bool | Nil = nil, non_splitting_tags : Array(String) | Nil = nil, splitting_tags : Array(String) | Nil = nil, ignore_tags : Array(String) | Nil = nil) : Array(TextResult)

def.name: translate_text
def.body:
if glossary_name
  glossary_id || (glossary_id = (get_glossary_info_by_name(glossary_name)).glossary_id)
end
if text.is_a?(String)
  text = [text]
end
params = {"text" => text, "target_lang" => target_lang, "source_lang" => source_lang, "formality" => formality, "glossary_id" => glossary_id, "context" => context, "split_sentences" => split_sentences, "preserve_formatting" => preserve_formatting, "tag_handling" => tag_handling, "outline_detection" => outline_detection, "non_splitting_tags" => non_splitting_tags, "splitting_tags" => splitting_tags, "ignore_tags" => ignore_tags}.compact!
response = Crest.post(api_url_translate, form: params, headers: http_headers_json, json: true)
handle_response(response)
parse_translate_text_response(response)
